original_text: Rachel's servant Bilhah became pregnant again. She gave birth to another son for Jacob.
korean_text: 라헬의 시녀 빌하가 다시 임신하여 둘째 아들을 야곱에게 낳으매

sentences.original_text: Rachel's servant Bilhah became pregnant again.
She gave birth to another son for Jacob.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 야곱을 위해 또 다른 아들을 낳았다.
